Creating Reports

All reports that you create in the application show all or some portion of the data displayed in the upper pane. For detailed information on the  fields that can be used in reports, see "Understanding the Fields" in Chapter 6 of  the StarTeam User's Guide. All reports are generated in .html format.

To create reports:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select Reports from the component or context menu. The Reports dialog displays the Available reports list box.

  4. From the Available reports list box, select any type of report.

  5. Do one of the following:

    • To include only the items selected on the upper pane, select the Current selection option button.

    • To include all items displayed in the upper pane, choose the Select all option button.

  6. In the Output file name text box, enter or browse for the report name and location. Be sure to use .htm or .html as the file extension.

  7. Enter a name for your report in the Report title text box.

  8. Do one of the following:

    • Click Generate to view the report on screen. Your Web browser opens and displays your report.

    • Click Print to print the report as it would appear in the browser.
